title: [Caffe2]an error occured when running resnet50_trainer.py
body_html:
hi ,all:
when I run Caffe2 example resnet50_trainer.py, an error occured:
Shape inference error: [enforce fail at conv_pool_op_base.h:626] in_size + *pad_head + *pad_tail >= dkernel. 2 vs 3
E0913 09:47:14.783671 26693 operator.cc:497] Operator: input: "gpu_0/conv1_spatbn_relu" output: "gpu_0/pool1" name: "" type: "MaxPool" arg { name: "order" s: "NCHW" } arg { name: "kernel" i: 3 } arg { name: "stride" i: 2 } arg { name: "ws_nbytes_limit" i: 67108864 } arg { name: "cudnn_exhaustive_search" i: 1 } device_option { device_type: 1 cuda_gpu_id: 0 } engine: "CUDNN"
I use cuda-9.0 and cudnn-7
Any suggestions please?
Thanks a lot!

body:
hi ,all:
   when I run Caffe2 example resnet50_trainer.py, an error occured:
   **Shape inference error**: [enforce fail at conv_pool_op_base.h:626] in_size + *pad_head + *pad_tail >= dkernel. 2 vs 3
E0913 09:47:14.783671 26693 operator.cc:497] Operator: input: "gpu_0/conv1_spatbn_relu" output: "gpu_0/pool1" name: "" type: "MaxPool" arg { name: "order" s: "NCHW" } arg { name: "kernel" i: 3 } arg { name: "stride" i: 2 } arg { name: "ws_nbytes_limit" i: 67108864 } arg { name: "cudnn_exhaustive_search" i: 1 } device_option { device_type: 1 cuda_gpu_id: 0 } engine: "CUDNN"
    I use cuda-9.0 and cudnn-7
    Any suggestions please?
    Thanks a lot!
